title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table on Stop-Fluted Legs, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table on Stop-Fluted Legs
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right of sheet: SERVING TABLE / 55.00, upper left edge of image, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular molded top raised on 4 straight, stop-fluted, turned legs; lower shelf attached half way up from floor level; low backsplash; stack of plates shown upper right corner of top.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table on Stop-Fluted Legs, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-65
